title: Consulting
content:
APEST Consulting

Customized Solutions for Applying APEST in your Context

Consulting Relationships

Whether you’re a pastor, missionary, ministry leader, or non-profit leader, we come alongside and help you navigate the complex challenges of applying APEST in your context. Choose between Craft consulting for customized 1 on 1 support, or Synergy consulting for customized team and organizational support.

Craft

Discover customized APEST solutions for your unique context

Craft consulting is for people who have a basic understanding of APEST and are developing as practitioners, but want customized 1 on 1 support as they apply APEST in thier unique context. Click on "The Journey" tab below for more details.
  • 10 Months
  • Mastermind Access
  • 20 Sessions
  • Breakthrough Results
Talk with Tim

The Journey

This 10 month 1 on 1 consulting experience has three modules. The first module focuses on developing a Clearer Assessment of your personal APEST Profile, Leadership Journey, APEST Maturity, and APEST Vision and Project.

  • Your APEST Vision is the big picture, long term view of what you want to see happen in your context.
  • Your APEST Project is an immediate, short term initiative that you can start implementing during the process

The second and third modules focus on developing Closer Alignment with, and Wider Application of, APEST paradigms and practices in your context, along with a Deeper Appreciation of your personal progress in the implementation of your APEST Vision and Project. For a more detailed description of the modules, click here.

The Calls

There are a total of 20 bi-weekly Zoom calls, each 6o minutes long. Each call consists of three blocks:

15

Check In

We start with a check in, processing learning and progress from previous action items, and setting goals for the call.

40

Explore

Generative dialogue that consists of probing questions, reflective listening, creative problem solving, and strategic resourcing with tools and tactics around key challenges and tasks.

5

Plan

Highlight and capture key learning moments from the call, and identify 2-3 action items moving forward

Outcomes

Each consulting session is designed to cultivate seven developmental outcomes related to APEST paradigms and practices.

  • Clearer Assessment
  • Greater Awareness
  • Closer Alignment
  • Higher Aptitudes
  • Stronger Advocacy
  • Wider Application
  • Deeper Appreciation

Each outcome helps focus the goals of each consulting session, and provide a metric by which you can assess your own growth throughout our consulting relationship. For a more detailed description of the outcomes, click here.

Deliverables

Every participant will recieve the following seven deliverables:

  • E-Participants Guide with Assessment Guides and Note Taking space for each session
  • Personal APEST Profile Assessment
  • Leadership Journey Assessment
  • APEST Vision Assessment
  • APEST Project Assessment
  • Downloadable files of all Tools, Graphics, Articles & Resources referenced
  • Video Recordings of all 20 consulting sessions

Get Started

Ready to take the next step in your APEST journey? Get started with Craft consutling:

  • Get access to an APEST Mastermind with seasoned expertise, allowing for real-time problem-solving, mentorship, and insights that are directly applicable to you and your vision.
  • Gain confidence in your creative abilities and decision making through constructive feedback and guided practice, empowering you to take bold creative steps.
  • Make significant, targeted progress on specific APEST projects with focused guidance on strategic planning and execution, turning your vision into an actionable reality in your context
  • Experience personal and vocational development, equipping you with the skills and sensibilities you need to continuously contribute to APEST ventures with knowledge, wisdom, and insight.

Using APEST paradigms and principles, together we'll craft customized solutions for applying APEST in your unique context, enabling you to turn your vision into reality.

Pricing

$2,400

Discounts for Edge-workers

Ask us about our discounts for missionaries, and those working in smaller churches and non-profits.

Synergy

Scale APEST across and beyond your organization

Synergy consulting is for teams that have a working knowledge of APEST, have started practicing APEST in their own context, but want to start applying APEST at every level of their organization. Click on "The Journey" tab below for more details.
  • Assessments
  • Team and Group Culture
  • Equipping Pathways
  • Organizational Alignment
Talk with Tim

The Journey

Synergy consulting helps you navigate the complex task of applying APEST in teams and organizations. We come alongside to facilitate an experience of generative dialogue that incorporates strategic analysis, pivotal insights, and organizing frameworks. The goal is to discover customized solutions that align with your deepest values and aspirations.

It starts with a conversation to determine your teams scope of interst and vision for applying APEST in your context. From there, we map out a customized consutling process that aligns our suite of services with your needs and goals.

For a more detailed look at the Synergy consulting experience, click here.

Our Services

Our tailored services are designed to maximize learning and development around APEST paradigms and practices. Whether it's our individual, team, or organizational APEST Assessments, Strategy Labs, Workshops, Retreats, or Follow Ups to process insights, set goals, identify next steps, and review progress, we collaborate with you to design a customized experience that fits the unique opportunities for growth in your team and organization. For a more detailed look at our services click here.

Outcomes

Our consulting services are designed to cultivate seven developmental outcomes related to APEST paradigms and practices.

  • Clearer Assessment
  • Greater Awareness
  • Deeper Appreciation
  • Stronger Advocacy
  • Higher Aptitudes
  • Closer Alignment
  • Wider Application

Each outcome helps focus the goals of our relationship and interactions, and provides a metric by which you can assess individual, team, and organizational growth throughout our consulting relationship. For a more detailed description of the outcomes, click here.

Deliverables

Every participant will recieve the following deliverables from our services:

  • E-Participants Guides with space for Note Taking
  • Downloadable files of all Presentatioin Slides, Frameworks, Tools, Diagrams, Graphics, Articles, & Resources used and referenced
  • Video Recordings of all online sessions

Get Started

Ready to unlock the tranformative power of APEST in your team and organizaton? Let's get started!

  • Get direct access to an APEST Mastermind. Tim will leverage his comprehensive understanding, seasoned experience, and warehouse of tools to develop customized solutions that are applicable to your team and organizations vision.
  • Find clarity on individual, team, and organizationl APEST profiles and maturity levels, positioning you to map out strategic assets, challenges, and opportunities for growth and maturity.
  • Experience tailored training, retreats, and coaching that directly addresses challenges and opportunities within your team and organization.
  • Enagage in strategic conversations that provide constructive feedback and guided practice, empowering you and your team to make significant, targeted progress on applying APEST in, across, and beyond your team and organization.

Using APEST paradigms and principles, together we'll craft customized solutions for applying APEST in your unique context, enabling you to unlock the tranformative power of APEST in your team and organization

Pricing

We understand that every team and organization is unique, with its own set of challenges and budget constraints. That's why we offer our Synergy consulting services on a sliding scale to accomodate your budget. Schedule a call with me to discuss your needs and let's determine a pricing structure that fits.

Frequently Asked Questions

Craft

What is Craft consulting, and who is it for?

Craft consulting is a 1 on 1 learning and development experience designed to help individuals discover, design, and develop customized solutions for applying APEST in their context. Wether it’s an inspiring vision, a short or long term goal, or a specific project, Tim comes alongside and offers the full range of his APEST knowledge, resources, connections, and skills to support and catalyze success. 

It’s ideal for anyone looking to supercharge their APEST venture with relational support, masterind resources, and achieve specific outcomes.   

Who leads the Craft consulting sessions?

The sessions are led by Tim Catchim who is one of the world’s leading subject matter experts, practitioners, and trainers in APEST paradigms and practices. 

How does the 1 on 1 consulting process work?

Craft consulting is comprised of 3 modules. The first module has 3 sessions, and explores your personal APEST Profile, your Leadership Journey, and your APEST Vision and Project. 

Your APEST Vision is the big picture, long term view of what you want to see happen in your context.

Your APEST Project is an immediate, short term initiative that you can start designing and developing during the consulting  experience.

Based on your APEST Vision and Project, we set practical agendas for each session (either iteratively or in batches). My task as your consultant is to create a supportive space for us to engage in focused reflection, creative conversations, constructive feedback, and strategic planning, ensuring a productive and enriching experience. For a more detailed description of the Craft consulting process, click here.

How can Craft consulting benefit me?

Craft consulting gives you Mastermind access to one of the world’s leading reflective practioners and trainers of APEST. Tim will leverage his extensive knowledge, wisdom, and experience, as well as all the relevant tools and resources at his disposal to partner with you in a creative process that generates customized solutions that fit your unique needs and goals, ensuring APEST paradigms and principles are applied in the most effective way possible in your context. 

How do I begin a consulting relationship?

Starting a consulting relationship is simple! Just click here and schedule your first conversation with Tim. 

When do Craft consulting sessions take place and how long do they last?

Craft consulting sessions take place on Zoom, Monday through Friday, at a time that overlaps between our mutual availability. There are a total of 20 one hour sessions. 

Is there any work required outside of the consulting sessions?

Technically, no. However, we do end each consulting session by identifying at least 2 or 3 action items for you to do before the next session so you can get traction and move forward in your APEST Project and Vision. 

What happens if I miss a session?

We understand that conflicts can arise. If you need to miss a session, we ask that you give us at least 48 hours notice so we can reschedule. For more on missed sessions, see our ‘Terms and Conditions’.

When the consulting sessions are completed, can I get ongoing support or resources?

Yes, definitely! Completing the consulting sessions doesn’t mean the end of your APEST journey with us. Everyone who participates in a consulting relationship is invited to join a private Facebook Group where you can connect, share insights, and grow together with others in their APEST journey. 

For those who want a more focused investment, you can enroll in our Co-Lab where other APEST practitioners and enthusiasts meet online twice a month for ongoing coaching and consulting with Tim. A Co-Lab is kind of like a Mastermind group meets Community of Practice, but more relational and interactive. See Co-Lab at the top of the page for more details.

Are there any prerequisites for participating in a consulting relationship?

The only prerequisite is a basic knowledge of APEST.

Is there a trial period for Craft consulting?

While we don’t offer a trial period, before diving into any commitments, we prioritize understanding exactly what you’re looking for and ensuring we can deliver to your expectations. Let’s have a chat to see how we can tailor our expertise to fit your unique needs and goals. 

We also provide a detailed Craft consulting description so you can understand the consulting relationship, process, content, and structure before making a commitment. To view this description click here.

What is the refund policy for Craft consulting?

We stand by the quality of our consulting, but we also understand that circumstances can change. Our refund policy is designed to be fair and transparent. Please refer to our ‘Terms and Conditions’ for detailed information on refunds.

Synergy

What is Synergy consulting, and who is it for?

Synergy consulting focuses on applying APEST within your team or organization to enhance leadership effectiveness, team dynamics, and organizational health and maturity. It includes APEST Assessments, Strategy Labs, Workshops, and Follow Up conversations, each tailored to the unique needs of your team and organizational context. 

It’s ideal for organizational leadership teams, denominational departments, and any group looking to scale APEST paradigms and practices within, across, and beyond the organization.

How does the Synergy conslting process work, and how long does it last?

It starts with a conversation to determine your teams scope of interst and vision for applying APEST in your context. From there, we map out a customized consutling process that fits your needs and goals. However, as a general rule, the first stage of the consulting process focuses on conducting APEST Assessements of team members, the team, and the organization.

Based on the results of those assessments, we enter into a focused stage of generative dialoge that incorporates strategic analysis, organizing frameworks, and pivotal insights. The goal is to  collaboratively map out an initial pathway for us to journey together on, which often includes tailored Strategy Labs, Workshops, Retreats for the team, and ongoing Follow Up conversations. For a more detailed look at the consulting experience, click here.

Who leads the consulting process?

The consulting process is led by Tim Catchim who is one of the world’s leading subject matter experts, practitioners, and trainers in APEST paradigms and practices. 

How can Synergy consulting benefit our team and organization?

Synergy consulting helps teams clarify their vision by aligning it with APEST paradigms and principles, ensuring that each APEST role and function is understood, embraced, and mobilized for individual and team impact. This alignment empowers team members to more effectively operate in their areas of gifting, contributing to a more focused and effective pursuit of team and organization’s goals. 

By guiding you in a process of recognizing and valuing the variety of APEST giftings within your team, and how they contribute to its health and vibrancy, our consulting fosters an environment where collaboration and teamwork can flourish. Your team will learn to leverage the unique strengths of each member, while also growing an maturing in the basic skills and sensibilities of each APEST gifting, leading to innovative solutions and a more healthy, cohesive team dynamic. 

As we develop a culture of continuous learning and adaptation within your team, you will develop the essential capcities for navigating the complexities of your organization in today’s cultutral context.

How do I begin a consulting relationship?

Starting a consulting relationship is simple! Just click here and schedule your first conversation with Tim.

When do Synergy consulting sessions take place and how long do they last?

Synergy consulting sessions can take place online or onsite. The consuting relationship can last a few days, weeks, months, or even years, depending on your needs and goals. 

The time, location, and format of our consluting sessions are mutually discerned after initial APEST Assessments of individual team members, the team, and the organization have been completed.  

Is there any work required outside of the consulting sessions?

Technically, no. However, we do encourage continuous learning throughout the consulting process, so resources that are appropriate for enhancing the realization of your APEST vision will be suggested, but not required. 

How is Synergy consulting for teams different form Vanguard coaching for teams?

Synergy consulting is a flexible, open ended process of resourcing teams with customized solutions for applying APEST in their team, organization, and context. It is an adaptive approach that can look different for each client depending on their needs, goals, and context.

Vanguard coaching is a more structured, 10 month process of helping teams apply APEST paradigms and practices in their leadership, team, and organizational culture. It is a streamlined approach that follows a specific developmental path to acheive focused outcomes. For more on Vanguard team coaching, click here.

When the consulting sessions are completed, can I get ongoing support or resources?

Yes, definitely! Completing a consulting proces doesn’t mean the end of your APEST journey with us. Everyone who participates in a consulting relationship is invited to join a private Facebook Group where you can connect, share insights, and grow together with others in their APEST journey. 

For those who want a more focused investment, you can enroll in our Co-Lab where other APEST practitioners and enthusiasts meet online twice a month for ongoing coaching and consulting with Tim. A Co-Lab is kind of like a Mastermind meets Community of Practice, but more relational. Click here for more  details.

Are there any prerequisites for participating in a consulting relationship?

The only prerequisite is a basic knowledge of APEST.

Is there a trial period for Synergy consulting?

While we don’t offer a trial period, before diving into any commitments, we prioritize understanding exactly what you’re looking for and ensuring we can deliver to your expectations. Let’s have a chat to see how we can tailor our expertise to fit your unique needs and goals. 

We also provide a detailed Synergy consulting description so you can understand the consulting relationship, process, content, and structure before making a commitment. To view this description here.

What is the refund polilcy for Synergy consutling?

We stand by the quality of our consulting, but we also understand that circumstances can change. Our refund policy is designed to be fair and transparent. Please refer to our ‘Terms and Conditions’ here for detailed information on refunds.
